Text:
I also have a La Jetee version with english narrator. That one has got an oppinonal audio track- commentary by director terry gilliam himself. I believe it's ripped from extra material from the '12 monkeys' dvd. 

Just say the word and I'll upload it.
yes this is subtitled, the subtitle file is included in this torrent file, but if you don't know how to get a separate "srt" subtitle file to open in a video, then ofcourse it's not subtitled.
Thank you very much for sharing this rare gem.
The reason it is still photos is at the time he could not get financing for film and decided to do it like this
I really want the english narrator version! Thanks!
